column34: Please let us know where you heard about us?

column10: My dog and dogwalker were almost hit when a negligent driver blew the stop sign at the corner of Woodley and Allan in Poplar Heights and Falls Church. This is not the first time that drivers have gone through this stop sign. There are no sidewalks in our neighborhood and I am often almost hit by cars driving way too fast on Woodley, Allan, Buckelew and Shreve. Also, we have a ton of thru traffic with people who do not live in the area but are only cutting across to S West Street. This is a dangerous situation. Of note, the driver that almost hit my dog and dogwalker blew kisses to my dog walker after almost hitting them to be even more rude.
